titles.title: Southern Nevada Readiness Center Act
A bill to provide for the conveyance of certain land in Clark County, Nevada, for use by the Nevada National Guard.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: 10/25/2005--Introduced. Southern Nevada Readiness Center Act - Permits Clark County, Nevada, to convey between 35 and 50 acres of land in Clark County to the Nevada Division of State Lands for use by the Nevada National Guard.
